name: Friday Night Funkin Mobile
description:
Welcome! Friday Night Funkin is Now Available At Mobile Devices So 

The Android Version Made By Malavida You Can Download From There if Any Lag in This itch. Io Version But It's Not Made By Official Developer Of FNF 

https://ninja-muffin24.itch.io/

iOS has Already a Version If u Don't Know You can Search at App Store! 

It's Not Mean That We Stole Or Something it's a game Have Fun

But Thanks To Malavida for Making The Android Version! 

Hope You Like It :D  ! 

And Yeah Thanks To iOS Developer too.
